p:
From Table 3 we can see that, the major amino acids found in the natural PK (blank) were glutamic acid, co-eluted serine and asparagine, as well as arginine. The result was consistent with a previous study on the amino acid composition of palm kernel meal, which found that glutamic acid and arginine were the most abundant (16.8 g/16 g of N and 11.56 g/16 g of N, respectively)
31 .
